author: Vincent Kearney
title: 138 new cases of Covid-19, 4 deaths in Northern Ireland
description: Northern Ireland's Department of Health has said four people have died in the past 24 hours after they were diagnosed with Covid-19.
content:
Northern Ireland's Department of Health has said four people have died in the past 24 hours after being diagnosed with Covid-19.
There have been a further 138 cases of the virus confirmed today, bringing the total there to 1,477.
